name: AImanhwa
description:
Today I want to send you the first test version of the Korean manhwa style art checkpoint

this is just a beta version, i hope the final version will be much better
This model had include the multiview concept for character design, so you don't need to use orther embedding like charturner
if you want picture with multi view, just use keyword like: character turnover sheet, character model sheet, multi view

Official version may be released in early July And here some sample of this model


This model NOT VAE baked
Pls down load yalm file include
For good result i will recommend setup at:
Clip skip 2
Sampler:DPM++ 2M SDE Karras
Steps:20+

CFG scale:4-8
and Hires Fix is strongly recommend, for me i most use 4X ultrasharp
Embeddings on hands-fix are strongly recommended. (bad-hand v5)


Looking forward to your reviews!
Pls support me if you can

My twitter account: https://twitter.com/dtkien91

my FB account: https://www.facebook.com/D.T.Kien.ATG/
My patreon page: https://www.patreon.com/Dtrungkien

modelVersions.name: v1.0
modelVersions.description: frist beta version, this is not finish yet
